original_text: Who put Jacob's descendants under the power of their enemies? Who gave the Israelites to people who would rob them? It was the Lord! He is the one that we have not obeyed. His people did not live in the way that he wanted. They did not obey his law. Who put Jacob's descendants under the power of their enemies? Who gave the Israelites to people who would rob them? korean_text: 야곱이 탈취를 당하게 하신 자가 누구냐 이스라엘을 약탈자들에게 넘기신 자가 누구냐 여호와가 아니시냐 우리가 그에게 범죄하였도다 그들이 그의 길로 다니기를 원하지 아니하며 그의 교훈을 순종하지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: under the power of their enemies?
to people who would rob them?
He is the one that we have not obeyed.
in the way that he wanted.
They did not obey his law.
